# GitHub Copilot Instructions

This repository showcases work at the intersection of agentic AI, decision intelligence, and graph-based knowledge systems.

## General Coding Standards

- Write clear, maintainable, and well-documented code
- Follow language-specific best practices and idioms
- Prioritize code quality, security, and performance
- Include comprehensive error handling and logging
- Write meaningful commit messages and pull request descriptions

## Code Review Guidelines

- Focus on correctness, security, and maintainability
- Provide constructive feedback with specific suggestions
- Verify that changes align with the project's architecture and patterns
- Check for potential security vulnerabilities
- Ensure adequate test coverage for new features and bug fixes

## Testing Practices

- Write unit tests for all new functionality
- Maintain existing test coverage
- Use appropriate testing frameworks for each language
- Test edge cases and error conditions
- Keep tests focused and maintainable

## Documentation

- Document all public APIs and interfaces
- Keep README files up to date
- Include usage examples where appropriate
- Document architectural decisions and design patterns
- Use clear, concise language
